quests.name: Stowaway's Step
quests.instructions: The island of Stowaway's Step includes the Docks, the town of Wickliff and the Island Tomb.

quests.name: Alice Hewer's Necklace
quests.instructions: Alice Hewer's Necklace is a Quest in Stowaway's Step.

quests.name: Kio's Papers
quests.instructions: Kio's Papers is a Quest in Stowaway's Step.

quests.name: Whispers of Wyland
quests.instructions: To start the quest use the Ghostly Key inside the Island Tomb and slay Ghost of Wyland Sercher, he will drop a Torn Note that triggers the quest when read. Alternatively you can speak to Revan Gavault at the altar and he will mistaken you for Wyland, thus giving you the quest to find him. To complete this quest all you have to do is hand the Torn Note to Lucian Revald.

quests.name: A Way To Erenshor
quests.instructions: To start the quest you need to finish Whispers of Wyland and have given one of the "brothers at the ritual" the Torn Note.

quests.name: Seaslimed Bracelet
quests.instructions: To get and complete this quest you need to give an Eye of Plaxitheris to Occuphage, Eater of Eyes "below" the Lighthouse. Which requires the Stowaway Step Lighthouse Key to enter.

quests.name: Willow Seeds
quests.instructions: This quest does not appear in your journal. To complete it, you must trade all five willow seeds to the Watcher on top of a mountain in Willowwatch Ridge.

quests.name: A Missing Person
quests.instructions: To start the quest prompt Xander Zaxtrough with [work] in Hidden Hills. To complete the quest prompt [Help] than [Open] with Cirreus Alxanth in Old Krakengard hidden prison quarters.

quests.name: Samuel's Note
quests.instructions: To start this quest say [note] to Samuel Thatcher in Hidden Hills. You can complete it by handing Samuel's Note to Harvey Alder in Port Azure

quests.name: A Sivakayan Horn for Ludo Luxo
quests.instructions: This quest given to Duelist only. To start the quest speak to Ludo Luxo in Hidden Hills and prompt him with [task]. Any class can complete this quest by handing Ludo Luxo a Sivakayan Horn

quests.name: A Skeleton Eye for Alyssia Fearnon
quests.instructions: This quest is for Druid only. To start this quest speak to Alyssia Fearnon in Hidden Hills and prompt her with [favor]. The Skeleton Eye can be obtained from A Skeleton Soldier and A Skeleton Captain.

quests.name: Faerie Dust for Nylith Valarro
quests.instructions: This quest is for Arcanist only. To start the quest speak to Nylith Valorro in Hidden Hills and prompt him with [job]. Bag of Faerie Dust is dropped from A Faerie Drone, Tinkles in Faerie's Brake.

quests.name: Graveweed Leaf for Benson Gamble
quests.instructions: This quest given to Paladins only. To start the quest speak to Benson Gamble in Hidden Hills and prompt him with [prove]. Any class can complete handing Graveweed Leaf to Benson Gamble.

quests.name: Grizzlepaw's Chain
quests.instructions: This quest is given to stormcallers, but can currently be started by any class. To start the quest, speak to Windlae Oldseer in Hidden Hills and prompt her with [test]. Any class can complete this quest by handing Windlae Oldseer a Weathered Chain

quests.name: Keys for Valrae
quests.instructions: To start the quest speak to Valrae Cleary in Faerie's Brake and prompt her with [Krakengard]. To complete the quest, hand er Krakengard Tower Key and Krakengard Bunk Key

quests.name: Liam's Note
quests.instructions: In order to start the quest slay Bassalt Vallano at the skeleton house in Faerie's Brake and read Note to Liam that he drops. To complete the quest give the note to Liam Kilfa in Duskenlight Coast.

quests.name: Ogre Spice for Valrae
quests.instructions: To start the quest speak to Valrae Cleary in Faerie's Brake and prompt her with [Underspine]. Complete the quest by handing her 4 Ogrespice Leaf

quests.name: Repairing Treasure Maps
quests.instructions: This repeatable quest is completed when handing Cecil Threbb four map pieces:

quests.name: A Hidden Cause
quests.instructions: To start the quest speak to Cirreus Alxanth who is locked in a cage behind the secret wall in Old Krakengard and prompt him with [open]. For the last step, you need to go through a secret wall in the Port Azure docks to find Styria Olafur and then say "Shadowtide" to them.

quests.name: Aetheria for Saya Seawatcher
quests.instructions: To start the quest speak to Saya Seawatcher in Vitheo's Watch and prompt her with [Aetheria]. This is a repeatable quest.

quests.name: A Hermit's Request
quests.instructions: To start the quest say [they] to A Hermit in Fernalla's Revival Plains.

quests.name: The Tragedy at Goodsoil
quests.instructions: To start the quest say [village] to Lieutenant Ulrik beside the remains of Goodsoil or [Goodsoil] to Alexander Farland near the entrance of the zone at the Druid stone circle in Fernalla's Revival Plains. It is currently impossible to complete this quest.

quests.name: A Note for C. Pillot
quests.instructions: The quest starts when you hand the Ornate Toolbox to A Hermit during the quest A Hermit's Request. He gives you a Notes of a Hermit that triggers this quest. Chazz Pillot is located in Port Azure between the market and docks.

quests.name: The Revival Plains Ritual
quests.instructions: Giving Asaga Underloft the Small Engraved Compass will begin this quest. To complete the quest trade all 4 items listed with the Ceremonial Brazier in Fernalla's Revival Plains.

quests.name: Hadden's Supplies
quests.instructions: Prompting Hadden Passican with [Ripper's] will begin this quest and hand you the Box of Supplies which must be handed to Leena Halsted in Ripper's Keep. She will give you Leena's Receipt to hand back to Hadden Passican to complete this quest.

quests.name: Druid Beads for Varran
quests.instructions: Prompting Varran Juctor with [dispose] will begin this quest. Complete it by handing him Decayed Druid Beads.

quests.name: Sivakayan Intel for Kilkay
quests.instructions: To start this quest hand Marching Orders to Captain Kilkay in Port Azure

quests.name: Croc Tails for the Poachers
quests.instructions: Repeatable quest given when hailing Poacher in Rottenfoot. Completed by handing them Croc Tails

quests.name: Accessing the Ethereal Planes
quests.instructions: This quest is for Arcanist only. To start this quest speak to Cerbantias Flameward who is beside the Lighthouse in Port Azure and prompt him with [hunt]. It is currently impossible to complete this quest.

quests.name: Soluna's Flameblade
quests.instructions: This quest is for Paladin only. To start this quest speak to Leyor M'Chante who is inside the church-lookin' building in Port Azure just near the entrance and prompt him with [Flameblade]. It is currently impossible to complete this quest.

quests.name: The Great Willow's Branch
quests.instructions: This quest is for Druid only. To start this quest speak to Orion Mycon who is outside of Port Azure by a shrine and prompt him with [cause]. It is currently impossible to complete this quest.

quests.name: Sivakayans in Port Azure
quests.instructions: To start the quest talk to the Captain Kilkay in Port Azure near the market.

quests.name: Repairing Orion's Ring
quests.instructions: To repair the Unsocketed Ring give it to Parmalee Gemlyn in Port Azure.

quests.name: Repairing Orion's Ring, Part 2
quests.instructions: Parmalee Gemlyn asks you to bring x1 Elderstone Shard and x1 Chunk of Citrine Sandsilver to repair the Unsocketed Ring.

quests.name: Intel from the Lost Cellar
quests.instructions: To start this quest speak to Foreman Hauck who is under the tent in front of the mines, which are to the left of the entrance gates in Port Azure just near the entrance and prompt him with [prisoners]. It can be completed by handing him a Aged Interrogation Note dropped by a Tortured Prisoner in the Lost Cellar

quests.name: Underloft's Compass
quests.instructions: This quest is not directly given to you, first you must obtain the Small Engraved Compass from the Mysterious Portal Once you have obtained the Small Engraved Compass hand it to Asaga Underloft in Port Azure

quests.name: A Key to Vitheo's Rest
quests.instructions: To start and complete the quest, hand a Sivakrux to Vethalo Gala

quests.name: The Angler's Ring
quests.instructions: To start and complete the quest, hand the Angler's Ring to Liani Bosh Prompt Liani Bosh with [help] to obtain Mold: Angler's Ring

quests.name: A Bounty on Ripper DeMerth
quests.instructions: To begin this quest, prompt Captain Kilkay in Port Azure with [Ripper's]. It is completed by handing him the Ear of Ripper. Completing stage 1 of this quest drops your reputation with the Ripper DeMerth faction to hostile levels.

quests.name: Rottenfoot Sashes for Alitho Echeswer
quests.instructions: To start the quest talk to the Alitho Echeswer in a house in the Port Azure marketplace, and prompt him with the word "collector". He'll ask you to bring him a Rottenfoot Sash.

quests.name: Ripper's Insignia Badges
quests.instructions: The quest is not directly given to you but when completing Mavik's Note, Captain Kilkay asks you to bring them Ripper Insignia Badges found on Ripper Soldiers. This quest grants reputation gain with The Citizens of Port Azure and causes you to lose reputation with Ripper DeMerth

quests.name: Wolf Meat for Fredrick
quests.instructions: To complete this repeatable quest, give Fredrick Templestone some Wolf Meat

quests.name: Bear Meat for Fredrick
quests.instructions: To complete this repeatable quest, give Fredrick Templestone some Bear Meat

quests.name: The Dark Flame
quests.instructions: To start this quest, read the Dark Flame Recipe. To complete it, place 2 Blight Crystals, 1 Blightwood Slab and 1 Spark of the First Flame on the Blackflame brazier in the Abomination wing.

quests.name: The Life Flame
quests.instructions: To start this quest, read the Life Flame Recipe. To complete it, place 2 Essence of Nature, 1 Loomingwood Branch and 1 Droplet of the First Frost on the Lifeflame brazier in the Abomination wing.

quests.name: The Duskenlight Ritual
quests.instructions: Complete Liam's Note and read The Duskenlight Ritual to start the quest. To complete the quest trade all 4 items listed with the Ceremonial Brazier in Duskenlight Coast.

quests.name: The Loss Stone
quests.instructions: To start the quest say [Sivakaya] to the Arcane Headmaster whilst wearing a Pupil's Pin You are handed Loss Stone when starting this quest.

quests.name: The Ancient Teachings
quests.instructions: Started and completed when handing Siva-Braxon Teachings (1), Siva-Braxon Teachings (2), and Siva-Braxon Teachings (3) to Braxon Michaen

quests.name: A Gift for Fernalla
quests.instructions: Given by saying [gate] to the Malor Mara This quest is likely related to unlocking a raid and cannot be completed at this time (but this is not confirmed officially)

quests.name: The Lost Soul
quests.instructions: *A trick to get Lost Soul to stop moving long enough to turn in the items is to "Hail". Completion Messages (Part 1):

quests.name: The Guardian Awakens
quests.instructions: Obtained and completed by talking to A Memory of Sivakaya once it has been revealed by holding the Nighthollow Candle in your inventory. This activates the statue required to obtain and complete She Sees You to access the rest of the dungeon.

quests.name: She Sees You
quests.instructions: Available after completing The Guardian Awakens Obtained and completed by walking in a circle around the second room in Jaws of Sivakaya whilst facing the statue of Sivakaya.

quests.name: A Pious Guest
quests.instructions: Given and completed by saying [Azynthi] to the Ward of Piety

quests.name: The Mathers' Demise
quests.instructions: WARNING: This article or section contains spoilers! Proceed with caution.

quests.name: Annaleigh's Nagalok Claws
quests.instructions: To start the quest say "inventor" to Annaleigh Hephan.

quests.name: Serra Stiles Shovel
quests.instructions: To start the quest speak to Serra Stiles. The Worn Shovel is a rare drop from A Subterranean Goop and A Subterranean Magmite.

quests.name: Mavik's Note
quests.instructions: To start the quest prompt Mavik Estonia with [Kilkay]. To complete the quest, hand Mavik Easton's Note to Captain Kilkay in Port Azure

quests.name: Albixt's Engagement Ring
quests.instructions: To start this quest speak to Albixt Munger in Silkengrass Meadowlands with the prompt [Lost] To complete this quest you must gather and hand him a Simple Engagement Ring
